org.smartfrog.services.dns
Interface DNSComponent

All Superinterfaces:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.Copying, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.PrettyPrinting, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.ReferenceResolver, org.smartfrog.sfcore.reference.ReferenceResolverHelper, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.Tags, org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.TagsComponent
All Known Subinterfaces:
DNSBindingIP, DNSData, DNSOptions, DNSView, DNSZone
All Known Implementing Classes:
DNSBindingIPImpl, DNSCollectionImpl, DNSComponentImpl, DNSDataImpl, DNSOpaqueImpl, DNSOptionsImpl, DNSViewImpl, DNSZoneImpl
public interface DNSComponent
extends org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription

A sub-class of component description that adds specific dns behaviour for parameter checking, linking, and configuration output.

Method Detail

sfDeployWith

void sfDeployWith(org.smartfrog.sfcore.componentdescription.ComponentDescription parent,
                  org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.Context cxt)
                  throws org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogDeploymentException
The "real" constructor of this component. It will recursively try to instantiate and configure all the components passed in its context.

Parameters:
parent - A parent in the description hierarchy.
cxt - A context from which to obtain arguments to configure this object.
Throws:
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogException - if an error occurs while initializing this component or any of its sub-components.
org.smartfrog.sfcore.common.SmartFrogDeploymentException

printNamedConfig

void printNamedConfig(java.io.PrintWriter out)
Writes the named.conf contents to the print writer. It propagates to its sub-components.

Parameters:
out - A print writer to dump the named.conf that bind needs.

Parameters:
